title: Functional & User Acceptance
description: During User Acceptance Testing, we document a series of test procedures to validate the fulfillment of specific application requirements. Our focus shifts to functional testing, where we thoroughly examine whether the software aligns with the prescribed specifications.

title: Automation Testing
description: To accelerate testing processes and ensure consistent outcomes, we leverage advanced automation tools and software. This approach guarantees reliable results while minimizing the time & effort required for manual testing.
list: Integration of automated test data preparation

title: Web Services Testing
description: Web services undergo rigorous evaluation using advanced software tools. This testing phase focuses on ensuring the API's functionality, performance, reliability, and security, contributing to a robust and seamless user experience.
